00020 $query = "SELECT name FROM observatories WHERE id=" . $_GET["id"];
00021 $result = $link->query($query);
00022 $res = mysqli_fetch_array($result, MYSQLI_ASSOC);
00023 mysqli_free_result($result);
00024 $link->close();
